humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'pNO' which stands for no regional lymph node metastasis. This is consistent with the new rules 10 and 11, which state that N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that axillary lymph nodes were removed and examined, but no cancer involvement was found in them (pNO). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
